title: How to switch the handwriting input method when editing a text
answer:
Create a short message, click the input box, and a soft keyboard pops up with TouchPal by default; and then click Languages on the soft keyboard to choose the handwriting input method you want. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109947) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109948)
